uno-reverse-alibi.title: UNO Reverse Alibi
uno-reverse-alibi.subtitle: Murder Mystery Challenge
uno-reverse-alibi.description: Solve the case‚Ä¶ but only after flipping the clues.
uno-reverse-alibi.longDescription: Puzzle challenge where you must skip obvious answers to find hidden solutions. Players work as detectives to uncover the truth behind a mysterious crime, but there's a twist - all evidence must be examined in reverse order using UNO reverse cards.
rules: Teams must work together to solve mysteries
Use of external resources is prohibited
uno-reverse-alibi.aboutEvent: A thrilling murder mystery where participants must use UNO reverse cards to uncover clues and solve the case. The twist? Everything must be analyzed backwards!

wild-card-auction.title: Wild Card Auction
wild-card-auction.subtitle: Strategic Bidding Game
wild-card-auction.description: Pick your players, flip your luck
wild-card-auction.longDescription: Strategic auction game where players bid on wild cards to build winning hands. Use your resources wisely to outbid opponents and collect the most powerful card combinations.
wild-card-auction.aboutEvent: An intense auction-based strategy game where players compete to acquire the most valuable wild cards through smart bidding and tactical gameplay.

uno-frame.title: UNO Frame: Capture the Colors
uno-frame.subtitle: Photography Challenge
uno-frame.description: See the world in four colors ‚Äî Red, Blue, Green, Yellow.
uno-frame.longDescription: A creative photography challenge where participants must capture the world through the lens of UNO's four primary colors. Create stunning visual narratives using only red, blue, green, and yellow elements.
rules: Must use only the four UNO colors
uno-frame.aboutEvent: Express your creativity through photography by capturing the world in UNO's signature colors. Show us how red, blue, green, and yellow can tell compelling visual stories.

draw-4-arena.title: Draw 4 Arena (Online Gaming)
draw-4-arena.subtitle: Digital Gaming Tournament
draw-4-arena.longDescription: Intense online gaming tournament featuring UNO-themed digital challenges. Compete against players from around the world in fast-paced, skill-based gaming competitions.
draw-4-arena.aboutEvent: The ultimate online gaming arena where UNO meets competitive esports. Battle it out in digital challenges that test your gaming prowess and strategic thinking.

skip-the-obvious.title: Skip the Obvious
skip-the-obvious.subtitle: Lateral Thinking Challenge
skip-the-obvious.description: Follow the clues‚Ä¶ unless the card tells you to skip.
skip-the-obvious.longDescription: A mind-bending puzzle challenge where obvious solutions are wrong. Participants must think laterally and skip conventional answers to find hidden solutions using UNO skip cards as guides.
skip-the-obvious.aboutEvent: Challenge your mind with puzzles where the obvious answer is always wrong. Use UNO skip cards to guide you past conventional thinking to discover hidden solutions.

uno-reverse-alibi-2.title: Murder Mystery
uno-reverse-alibi-2.subtitle: Advanced Detective Challenge
uno-reverse-alibi-2.description: Solve the case‚Ä¶ but only after flipping the clues
uno-reverse-alibi-2.longDescription: The sequel to our popular murder mystery event with more complex cases and intricate clues. Advanced detective work required as participants unravel mysteries using reverse logic and UNO card mechanics.
uno-reverse-alibi-2.aboutEvent: Take on more challenging murder mysteries in this advanced detective challenge. Use your investigative skills and UNO reverse logic to crack the toughest cases.

logic-reverse.title: Logic Reverse: The Brain Battle
logic-reverse.subtitle: Reverse Engineering Challenge
logic-reverse.longDescription: Work backwards from solutions to understand complex logic problems. This brain battle challenges participants to reverse-engineer solutions and think in completely new ways using UNO logic mechanics.
logic-reverse.aboutEvent: The ultimate brain battle where logic meets reverse engineering. Challenge your mind to work backwards from solutions and discover new ways of thinking.

color-chaos-quiz.title: üé® WILD PROMPT LAB üé®
color-chaos-quiz.subtitle: Creative AI Challenge
color-chaos-quiz.description: Unleash creativity. Master prompts. Expect the unexpected.
color-chaos-quiz.longDescription: Wild Prompt Lab is a fast-paced creative challenge where teams explore prompt engineering + AI image generation using Google Gemini. With UNO-style cards and surprise Wild Flip twists, imagination is pushed to the limit!

round1.name: Prompt Crafter + Wild Flip
round1.description: Draw Color üé® | Object üß© | Style üé≠ cards, create a prompt & generate 1 AI image, Wild Flip Card changes the rules, modify prompt & generate 1 more image

round2.name: Speed Prompt Showdown
round2.description: Mystery Theme + Secret Element, create 1 final AI image, 1-minute idea presentation

rules: Use only Google Gemini for AI image generation
Cards will be provided by organizers
Wild Flip cards can change rules mid-round
Top teams from Round 1 qualify for Round 2
requirements: Basic understanding of AI prompt engineering
color-chaos-quiz.aboutEvent: üé® About the Event: Wild Prompt Lab is a fast-paced creative challenge where teams explore prompt engineering + AI image generation using Google Gemini. With UNO-style cards and surprise Wild Flip twists, imagination is pushed to the limit! Teams will navigate through two exciting rounds, testing their creativity, adaptability, and prompt crafting skills while generating stunning AI images.

steps: Draw Color üé®, Object üß©, and Style üé≠ cards
Create initial prompt based on drawn cards
Generate first AI image using Google Gemini
Draw Wild Flip Card (changes the rules!)
Modify prompt according to Wild Flip requirements
Create final prompt incorporating both elements
